controlAutocomplete

Description

Custom control type with autocomplete functionality. (use the shortcut version with control directive)

Dependencies

  • ngModel

Usage

as attribute
<ANY control-autocomplete="{service}"
     model="{model}"
     can-create="{boolean}"
     flatten="{boolean}"
     queryable="{boolean}"
     key="{string}"
     label="{string}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
controlAutocompleteservice

the datasource service

modelmodel

the target model of control

canCreateboolean

setted on true the control can add new entities

(default: false)

flattenboolean

set to true to flat the value to the model

(default: false)

queryableboolean

set to true if is a queryable service

(default: false)

keystring

optional key for select option

(default: id)

labelstring

optional label for select option

(default: name)

Example

Source
